Html:
I was turned on to this website today and absolutely LOVE YOU PEOPLE! Your controls are and actual answer to prayer, believe it or not. I am going to point everyone I know straight here who needs this kind of excellent stuff!
Awesome!!!

I do have a question:
When I attempt to set the gradient High and Low settings to Transparent in the Gradient Navigation Button I do not get Transparent I get white, any ideas why?

Would greatly appreciate some direction.

God Bless,

Brenton
